quotes.quote: The emotion that can break your heart is sometimes the very one that heals it
The pain started years ago, but I'd lived with it for so long at that point that I'd accepted it as an inevitable part of me.
Some people use their own hurt as an excuse for hurting others.
It's a lot easier to be angry at someone than it is to tell them you're hurt.
You can't stop loving someone if you had already fallen; all you can do is hurting yourself.
Positive feelings come from being honest about yourself and accepting your personality, and physical characteristics, warts and all; and, from belonging to a family that accepts you without question.
Thoughts are the shadows of our feelings - always darker, emptier and simpler.
Do not give in too much to feelings. A overly sensitive heart is an unhappy possession on this shaky earth.
A person will be just about as happy as they make up their minds to be.
I have feelings too. I am still human. All I want is to be loved, for myself and for my talent.
We often confuse what we wish for with what is.
Sometimes your mind says No but your heart says Go.

It is a curious sensation: the sort of pain that goes mercifully beyond our powers of feeling. When your heart is broken, your boats are burned: nothing matters any more. It is the end of happiness and the beginning of peace.
Where there is love there is life.
There is no remedy for love than to love more.
Never play with the feelings of others, because you may win the game, but the risk is that you will surely lose the person for life time.
You cannot make yourself feel something you do not feel, but you can make yourself do right in spite of your feelings.
One of the greatest feelings in the world is knowing that we as individuals can make a difference. Ending hunger in America is a goal that is literally within our grasp.

quotes.cite: Augustus William Hare and Julius Charles
quotes.quote: The feeling is often the deeper truth, the opinion the more superficial one.
They may forget what you said, but they will never forget how you made them feel.
Feelings are not supposed to be logical. Dangerous is the man who has rationalized his emotions.
There is no feeling, except the extremes of fear and grief, that does not find relief in music.
To feel valued, to know, even if only once in a while, that you can do a job well is an absolutely marvelous feeling.
The deepest feeling always shows itself in silence; not in silence, but restraint.
You can close your eyes to the things you do not want to see, but you cannot close your heart to the things you do not want to feel.
Whatever you do, you should do it with feeling.
Emotions are celebrated and repressed, analyzed and medicated, adored and ignored -- but rarely, if ever, are they honored.
There is no instinct like that of the heart.
Our feelings are our most genuine paths to knowledge.
We destroy ourselves when we stop feeling. If you bury your feelings within you, you become a graveyard.
My feelings are the language of my soul.
Since it is our thoughts that create our feelings and emotions and it is our perspective that creates our reality this is of the highest importance.
Bear the pain of living with ugly feelings rather than attacking yourself for having them or attacking others to escape them.
Sometimes you cannot believe what you see, you have to believe what you feel.
People love others not for who they are, but for how they make them feel.
Be who you are and say what you feel, because who mind don't matter and those who matter don't mind.

Feelings of worth can flourish only in an atmosphere where individual differences are appreciated, mistakes are tolerated, communication is open and rules are flexible-the kind of atmosphere that is found a nurturing family.
Your feelings most time go with the wind.

But try getting blindly carried away by your feelings, without reasoning, without a primary cause, driving conciousness away at least for a time; start hating; or fall in love, only so as not to sit with folded arms.
There are no words to express the feeling and reality of completeness, our natural state of being. It can only be experienced.
Decisions that apply to your feelings are the cause of great suffering.
Living people do not make excuses for their emotions. They accept that feelings come as part of the human package; they embrace and walk with them on their journey.

Best way to get away from negative feelings and emotions is to involve ourselves without getting involved. It comes by practice and is beneficial for our health; be it physical, mental, emotional or spiritual.
Let everything happen to you, beauty and terror, no feeling is final.
Feeling and longing are the motive forces behind all human endeavor and human creations.
The most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen, nor touched. but are felt in the heart.
Whatever you believe with feeling becomes your reality.
Deal with your feelings.
Tired of hiding my feelings in the darkness so I must come clean.
Some days it's difficult to explain the feelings that rush in and out of the bloodstream.
I have to fight off those unwanted feelings of negativity
For us, as human beings are feelings are our guide.
Our feelings are exactly what makes us human.
Never hide your true feelings because if you do you're hiding the best part of yourself that you want everybody to see not to mention punishing yourself.
To feel so much love for one person is by far one of the greatest feelings you'll ever having your entire life
The Bible teaches us to be more concerned about the needs and feelings of others than our own.
Our culture puts feelings first, but true love isn't based on feelings.
Build standards that are not distorted or compromised by negative feelings.
The more you remember your goals and respect your restraint, the less power your negative feelings will have to shape your actions and reduce your self-respect.
Whether you are forced to live with hate, yearning, envy, or fear, respect what you do with your feelings, not what they do to you.
If you're self-critical about your negative feelings, you may be tempted to live with people who dislike you as much as you dislike yourself.
This is the greatest paradox: the emotions cannot be trusted; yet it is the emotions that tell us the greatest truths.
Ridding yourself of negative emotions can make you a new person. Suddenly you will find you have time, energy and abilities you never dreamt you had.
Your emotions can keep you well. If you are happy at home, content in your job, feel accepted by colleagues and receive praise for work done, healthy emotions are nourishing you.
Feelings can never be categorized simply as 'good' and 'bad'.
Feelings are symptoms of complex reactions.
Good manners include showing consideration for the feelings of others.
Let yourself feel the real feelings, and stop living the lives of others.
Respect for your own personality is your relationship with yourself when you don't blame yourself for any actions, don't follow others, and when you feel a harmony of feelings, thoughts and actions.
Your feelings would have been coming from your external perceptions and satisfaction of egoism.
In rushing to overtake something we don't even comprehend, we are always followed by fear, unease, envy, and other negative feelings.
After losing our feelings, we usually try to bring them back at any price.
Own feelings were not always what mattered most.
Strong feelings which alone could estimate it truly, were the very feelings which ought to taste it but sparingly.
It is hard for woman to define her feelings in language which is chiefly made by men to express theirs.
After great pain, a formal feeling comes.
Mankind are governed more by their feelings than by reason. Events which excite those feelings will produce wonderful events.
Without them (feelings) there would not be I. And without me who will experience them? They are right near by. But we don't know what causes them.
If you let people follow their feelings, they will be able to do good. This is what meant by saying that human nature is good.

We cannot judge either of the feelings or of the character of men with perfect accuracy, from their actions or their appearance in public; it is from their careless conversation, their half-finished sentences, that we may hope with the greatest probability of success to discover their real character.
Pain in the doing, ease in the writing. Memory calls distant,words answer back. Time of no meaning, experience flows. Images resurface—feelings attack.
No, words can describe it. I let it lead me as I will in the future also. These inner feelings of yours.
The perfume of your silence lingers,—in scented feelings without words.
When the feelings are polished,--- the words can remain rough.

The poet's job is to put into words those feelings we all have that are so deep, so important, and yet so difficult to name, to tell the truth in such a beautiful way, that people cannot live without it.
Express the inner feelings of your gratification outwardly.
One has to transcend all petty human feelings in order to attain supreme love.
Women are as old as they feel - and men are old when they lose their feelings.
In a healthy relationship when things come about, partners have feelings they talk and work out.
It is unhealthy to have feelings deep to hold-eventually you will explode.
I have no reason to harbor unjust feelings toward others, for there is nothing set in the stone that says my enemies must always be my enemies.
The feelings of hell exists only within the ego thought system.
May you continue to write your story and share it, knowing you are the only one who can fill those pages with your own thoughts, experiences, feelings and emotions.

I choose to express my feelings and emotions, not keeping them locked up inside and not allowing anyone to tell me differently because I know that it's okay to cry and it's okay to talk about what I've been through because to hold it all inside is not healthy.
Denying their true feelings, they star in a false act.

It is essential to master your feelings and emotions at all times and to maintain personal power, self-discipline, spiritual vigilance, focus, concentration, and single-pointedness, however, it is also essential to integrate them.
Since it is our thoughts that create our feelings and emotions and it is our perspective that creates our reality this is of the highest importance.
